whatWeDo.title: We support the world's most important farms
whatWeDo.subtitle: Our research reveals insights unimagined by others and move swiftly to regenerate soil. We work with farms who have displayed a commitment to ecologically and socially responsible management practices and forged deep emotional connections with their target consumers.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We focus on balancing and remineralizing soil. We aim to guide your farm on a more thoughtful trajectory than one could achieve alone.

strategy.title: Five Principles. One Strategy.
strategy.description: Our principles guide how we create value for our clients. Todd provides a holistic ecosystem from soil management to produce marketing. All to help farms improve soil health and quickly implement solutions.

1.title: Advanced Research with Disciplined Data Selection
1.description: We strive to be a partner of choice given our team’s expertise, resources and complementary capabilities.

2.title: Data-Driven Crop Production and Produce Safety
2.description: We utilize differentiated analytics and digital capabilities to understand disease and insect mitigation.

3.title: Operation Management Across Different Farming Categories
3.description: Concentrating on a small group of farms across our categories of management.

4.title: NOP and Demeter Integrity
4.description: We require all clients to meet NOP or Demeter requirements, though certain allowances necessitated by existing circumstances are considered.

5.title: Market Entry & Consumer Awareness
5.description: Leverage our team’s complementary experience as entrepreneurs exploration of direct-to-consumer and CSA marketing.

1.title: Firm Representation
1.description: Todd is assembling a firm designed to mirror the consumer bases of our farms, embracing a holistic pace of life that nourishes the the natural character of individuals, communities and the earth, in order to make what we believe to be the best management decisions.

2.title: Team Focus
2.description: We seek to instill responsibility and sustainability into our values and culture and we strive to partner with self-supporting farms that value the Todd team's potential ability to effect change in this area.

3.title: Farm Alignment and Integration
3.description: Agreement on and implementation of farm management practices in an effort to achieve well-defined goals focused on responsibility and sustainability.

4.title: Broader Communities
4.description: We believe our farmers should seek to emulate and propel the responsible and sustainable values of our Firm in the communities they operate in and with the consumers they touch.

disclaimers.1: Todd may request testing for toxic agents in areas determined to have an elevated contamination risk. Environmental factors which can endanger the marketability of produce irrespective of its organic status is not included. Maximum toxic agent tolerance levels are determined by Todd at the time of Account Application. If contamination persists beyond a recognized period, Todd may pause or terminate future access to services and seed products. Contamination must be continuously monitored and documentation maintained verifying compliance.
disclaimers.2: Application of synthetic fertilizers and chemicals is prohibited without written approval.
disclaimers.3: Split operations and parallel production is not permitted.
disclaimers.4: Services and products are subject to eligibility and are not guaranteed. Todd may restrict the use of products in areas with known production of genetically engineered crops.
